ext_description.p: A Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land is a type of . The shape of the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land is dependent both on the passage that is within the shape of the land (where that passage is included for the purpose of connecting the component terminal to a trace on the substrate) and on the size of the terminal that is going to be resting on the board. A Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land is an interface to a PCB or to a PWB, and therefore includes an external access mechanism.
ext_description.note: A Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land principally provides a location for the solder joint.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the interface_access_mechanism is an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land as its . This relationship is for external access only.
the reference_passage specifies the for the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land.
the derived_from specifies the role of the for the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land.

ext_description.p: A Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land is a type of . The shape of the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land is dependent both on the passage that is within the shape of the land (where that passage is included for the purpose of connecting the component terminal to a trace on the substrate) and on the size of the terminal that is going to be resting on the board.
ext_description.note: A Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land principally provides a location for the solder joint.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the interface_access_mechanism is an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land as its . This relationship is for external access only.
the reference_passage specifies the for the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land.
the derived_from specifies the role of the for the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land.

A Component_termination_passage_dependent_land is a type of . The shape of the Component_termination_passage_dependent_land is dependent only on the passage that is within the shape of the land (where that passage is included for the purpose of connecting the component terminal to a trace on the substrate).
the derived_from specifies the role of the for the Component_termination_passage_dependent_land.
the reference_passage specifies the role of the for the Component_termination_passage_dependent_land.

A Component_termination_passage_dependent_non_functional_land is a type of . The shape of the Component_termination_passage_dependent_non_functional_land is dependent only on the passage that is within the shape of the land (where that passage is included for the purpose of connecting the component terminal to a trace on the substrate).
the derived_from specifies the role of the for the Component_termination_passage_dependent_non_functional_land.
the reference_passage specifies the role of the for the Component_termination_passage_dependent_non_functional_land.

ext_description.p: A Contact_size_dependent_land is a type of whose shape is dependent on the size of the contact area of the that will be joined to the Contact_size_dependent_land in the assembly.
ext_description.example: Figure 1 is a detail that illustrates the Contact_size_dependent_land in relationship to the terminal that mates with it.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the derived_from specifies the role of the for the Contact_size_dependent_land.
A Contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land is a type of whose shape is dependent on the size of the contact area of the that will be joined to the in the assembly.
the derived_from specifies the role of the for the Contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land.

ext_description.p: A Land is a type of . A Land may be a , a , a , a , or a . A Land helps compose a or a .
ext_description.note: In the context of this standard, a Land may be external or internal to the interconnect.
ext_description.example: Figure 2 illustrates the relationship of a Land to the other elements of a construction known in the domain as a padstack.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the access_mechanism is an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Land is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Land as its . There shall be one or more for a Land. This relationship is for internal access only.

ext_description.p: the derived_from specifies the primary role of the for the Land. The derived_from need not be specified for a particular Land.
ext_description.note: The allows an application to discover the derived_from for the Land through the .. path.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the alternate_land_definition specifies one role of the for the Land. The alternate_land_definition need not be specified for a particular Land.
A Land_interface_terminal is a type of included to identify the interface available to be fastened to in the next level of assembly.
the definition specifies the role of the for the Land_interface_terminal.
The associated_component shall be of type , or , or .
A Land_join_terminal is a type of included in the design to mate directly with a terminal of another fabricated feature by use of a internally in a layout.
the associated_component specifies the role of the for the Land_join_terminal.
the definition specifies the role of the for the Land_join_terminal.
A Non_functional_land is a type of whose implementing is not also being composed by other instances of . A Non_functional_land may be one of a , a , a , an , a , or a .

the access_mechanism is an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Non_functional_land is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Non_functional_land as its . There shall be one or more for a Non_functional_land. The access_mechanism is only provided for support of plated passages within the lateral geometric boundary of the Non_functional_land.
the derived_from specifies one role of the for the Non_functional_land.

the alternate_land_definition specifies one role of the for the Non_functional_land. The alternate_land_definition need not be specified for a particular Non_functional_land. An alternate_land_definition overrides the derived_from if it is provided.

ext_description.p: A Non_functional_land_interface_terminal is a type of included to identify the interface available for attachment in the next level of assembly.
ext_description.note: Use of this capability occurs when a member of references a member of Non_functional_land_interface_terminal to assign a relationship to an . A Non_functional_land_interface_terminal shall only be associated to types of established for the purpose of interface attachment.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the associated_component specifies the role of the for the Non_functional_land_interface_terminal.
the definition specifies the role of the for the Non_functional_land_interface_terminal.
The associated_component shall be of type , or , or .

A Non_functional_land_join_terminal is a type of that is included in a design to support the description of the relationship between the and a plated passage that implements a connection to a feature on a different member of than the member of the Non_functional_land_join_terminal is associated with.
the associated_component specifies the role of the for the Non_functional_land_join_terminal.
the definition specifies the role of the for the Non_functional_land_join_terminal. The valid purposes for a Non_functional_land_join_terminal are to connect to a or a .
A Plated_passage_dependent_land is a type of whose shape is dependent only on a .
the derived_from specifies the role of the for the Plated_passage_dependent_land.
the reference_plated_passage specifies the role of the for the Plated_passage_dependent_land.
A Plated_passage_dependent_non_functional_land is a type of whose shape is dependent only on a .
the derived_from specifies the role of the for the Plated_passage_dependent_non_functional_land.
the reference_plated_passage specifies the role of the for the Plated_passage_dependent_non_functional_land.
An Unsupported_passage_dependent_non_functional_land is a type of whose shape is dependent upon the shape of an .
the derived_from specifies the role of the for the Unsupported_passage_dependent_non_functional_land.
the reference_passage specifies the role of the for the Unsupported_passage_dependent_non_functional_land.
A Via_and_contact_size_dependent_land is a type of whose shape is dependent upon a as well as the size of a .

the interface_access_mechanism is an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Via_and_contact_size_dependent_land is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Via_and_contact_size_dependent_land as its . This relationship is for external access only.
the reference_via specifies the role of the for the Via_and_contact_size_dependent_land.
the derived_from specifies the role of the for the Via_and_contact_size_dependent_land.

ext_description.p: A Via_and_contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land is a type of whose shape is dependent on a as well as the size of a .
ext_description.note: The shape is primarily a function of the mating terminal.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the interface_access_mechanism is an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Via_and_contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Via_and_contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land as its . This relationship is for external access only.

A Via_dependent_land is a type of whose shape is dependent only on a .
